column5: Nothing fancy just 2 guys in a boat fishing.  My brother had one in the boat before I had even decided what lure to use.    Most of them today were that size unfortunately.  Only in focus photo of me with a fish today.    Big fish of the day casting a suspending husky jerk. 36-37 inches
I'd take that over my day in the office - any time. Good start to the long weekend.
Nice!!!!  Looks like a great day and that one fish is a fatty?
sheesh. All these reports and I haven't got out once yet. That second one is a beaut!

My brother got a few on zaras and I got some on a syclops both in fire tiger. Husky jerks in natural colours produced the rest including a real beauty that was lost at the boat that might haunt us both all season. That's fishin'.

Always enjoy your stories with you & your brother Rob.  My brother and I fished together all the time and if he was still with us him and I would have left yesterday for our annual trek to Quinte for spring time eyes.  I miss those trips alot but reading your tales always brings back many great memories.
Nice fish dude, boats been in for over a week and yet to get out!  Your bro's looks chunky!
Do I see you wearing SPAM?  Nice as always Rob.
Do I see you wearing SPAM?  Nice as always Rob. Nope. I'd either had to have got it for free and/or received payment it lieu of.
Nice job Rob, any weed growth out there yet?
There was. More than I remember from last year at the same time.
Yeah last year was pitiful for early season weed growth.   I'll be out there this week with the oldman (I like to avoid weekend boat traffic, lol)
The last one is a fatty!  Nicely done
Well done guys !!! Great day on the water for sure ...nice color on that pike too.
